title: Scam Alert!!
selftext:
Location: Airports - Domestic

MO

These guys use a LPU student Id Card(Lovely Professional University) and say they missed their flight….Asks for a phone to call mom….phone is switched off...Dad works overseas 

Then ask for some money to buy a ticket and promise to return it after they establish contact with mom

Obviously abscond with the money

Happened with me in Goa, but looks like these guys operate as a network across the country….If you see anyone with Id card, walk away or better yet, Call the police
